dbMetadata.DBMS: Oracle - Oracle Database 12c Enterprise Edition Release 12.1.0.2.0 - 64bit Production With the Partitioning, Real Application Clusters, OLAP, Advanced Analytics and Real Application Testing options

action.description: Gerar Pedido de Serviço por Período

instance.name: TSFAHMC
instance.expression: this.NUAPONT In (Select m.nuapont From AD_TSFAHMMAQ m Join ad_tsfsstc s On m.codsolst = s.codsolst Where s.codsol In (Select codusu From tsiusu Where codcencuspad In (Select codcencuspad From tsiusu Where codusu = ctx[usuario_logado])) or s.codsol = ctx[usuario_logado] or ctx[usuario_logado] In (0,429,626,233,1250,714) ) Or ctx[usuario_logado] In (Select codusu From ad_centparamusu Where nupar = 4) Or ctx[usuario_logado] In (0, 216)

tableInfo.name: AD_TSFAHMC
tableInfo.telaDescription: /*Autor: Marcus Rangel*/ Tela principal da rotina de apontamento de horas máquina. TSF - Tabela Super Frango AHM - Apontamento de hrs maq C - Cabeçalho

field.name: DTULTFECHA
field.expression: #type.sql# SELECT MAX(DTFECHA) FROM AD_TSFAHMAPD A WHERE A.NUAPONT = AD_TSFAHMC.NUAPONT

tableInfo.name: AD_TSFSSTI
tableInfo.telaDescription: /*Autor: M. Rangel*/ Aba itens - Sol. Serviços Transporte

field.name: VLRTOT

tableInfo.name: AD_TSFAHMFAT
tableInfo.telaDescription: /*Autor: Marcus Rangel*/ Aba faturamento na tela de apontamento, view.

tableInfo.name: AD_TSFAHMRAD
tableInfo.telaDescription: /*Autor: Marcus Rangel*/ TSF -Tabela Super Frango AHM - Apontamento de Horas Máquina RAD - Resumo de Apontamento Diário view da tshahmtad

tableInfo.name: AD_TSFSSTC

field.name: STATUS
SEQAPONTDIA

tableInfo.name: AD_TSFCME
tableInfo.telaDescription: /*Autor: M. Rangel */ Tela principal do Cadastro de Maquinas e equipamentos.

tableInfo.name: AD_TSFSSTM
tableInfo.telaDescription: /*Autor: M. Rangel*/ Aba Máquinas - Sol. Serviços Transporte

field.name: CODPARC
CODSERV

relation.expression: @form-filter[this.CODMAQ IN (select codmaq from ad_tsflsm where codserv in (select codserv from ad_tsfssti where nussti = form.NUSSTI)) and this.REVISADO = 'S']@ref-param[force-one-to-one=true]
